title: Tales of Pocoro for Wear
summary: Tales of Pocoro is a unique puzzle game for Wear with gorgeous RPG gfx.
description: Only for Wear, Tales of Pocoro is a unique and interesting puzzle game with gorgeous and cute RPG graphics at your wrist.  Enjoy more than 200 levels and 3 levels of difficulty.Unlock new characters and random mode for unlimited fun!Square and round displays are supported.  GAMES RULESThe goal is to reach the exit. However to make things a bit more interesting, you will have to clear other strange columns before exiting to achieve the level.There are 3 levels of difficulty, the harder you choose the more columns you will have.  HOW TO PLAY• Move your character by swiping or tapping the arrows (keyboard and trackball are also supported).• Long press to pause and spawn the menu options.• Put your palm completely over the screen until it vibrates to quickly exit.• Double-tap (very fast) anywhere to enter and leave the camera mode.
descriptionHTML:
Only for Wear, Tales of Pocoro is a unique and interesting puzzle game with gorgeous and cute RPG graphics at your wrist.

Enjoy more than 200 levels and 3 levels of difficulty.
Unlock new characters and random mode for unlimited fun!
Square and round displays are supported.

GAMES RULES
The goal is to reach the exit. However to make things a bit more interesting, you will have to clear other strange columns before exiting to achieve the level.
There are 3 levels of difficulty, the harder you choose the more columns you will have.

HOW TO PLAY
• Move your character by swiping or tapping the arrows (keyboard and trackball are also supported).
• Long press to pause and spawn the menu options.
• Put your palm completely over the screen until it vibrates to quickly exit.
• Double-tap (very fast) anywhere to enter and leave the camera mode.
comments: AQ STUDIO=depth and love in their wear games. Brilliant puzzle/maze game with full features. Has one annoying bug though....sometimes when you swipe in a direction to move it interferes with wears op and exits the game. Needs option to tap screen edges to move in that direction. Biggest puzzle is why is there an rpg world going on in all the backgrounds? Is this a fund raiser for something bigger?
Great port Love the work that went into this game and the port. It's a stunning little game on my watch. One thing, is Easy Level 12 possible or is there a bug? Can't figure it out.
An excellent game, very impressed. The swipe controls don't appear to work 100% of the time, but the tap ones do. Love the graphics, and the stuff going on in the background.

Nice! Works well on wear, simple style and gameplay, only thing I'd like to see (if possible) would be some way to save progress between switching phones or factory resets... instead of starting over from zilch each time.
Meh... As far as the selection goes for Wear this is good.  In reality, its glitchy and recycles rpg maker skins.  Moto 360 with s4.
recentChanges: Fixed an OpenGL crash on Wear 5.*
